channel.title: Configurationmanagement on zzamboni.org
channel.description: Recent content in Configurationmanagement on zzamboni.org

item.title: The State of Open Source System Automation
item.description: The days of DIY system administration are rapidly coming to a close. Why? Because the open source tools available are just too good not to use. Presenting Bcfg2, Cfengine, Chef and Puppet. via linux-mag.com Nice overview of the Usenix 2010 Configuration Management Summit, including descriptions and comparisons of the four major open-source CM systems.
